awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 7 wins & 4 nominations.

fullplot: Drama on the dawning love between a Polish woman and a farmer from Groningen. Anna is forced to work in a brothel, but manages to escape. She's found, exhausted and scared, by Henk (the farmer) who offers her a place to stay, but her past chases her.
plot: Polish deceived woman hides from pimps on a Dutch farm, and shares an intriguing romance with the farmer.
title: The Polish Bride
